title: MY ACCOUNT GOT PERMABAN BECAUSE OF MY LITTLE BROTHER ( PLEASE HELP ME RESTORE IT)
body: Hello guys, my name is Kevin Nguyen. i was recently away for college, and while i was away my little brother got into my account and said a whole bunch of toxic things such as telling someone to lynch themselves that is really fucked up. I would not do sucha  thing that is but he does have a bit of a rage problem. I have spent $1320 on this game and i really do not want that to go to waste please help me out guys. I do agree however i have got banned before due to my mistakes but i was reforming for a year i basically quit league and i try to come back more positive then ever and i was Permaban i already sent an email asking them to restore it but can you guys please support me and show this forum thread some favorism so that i can get it ban. P.S i already yelled at my little brother for doing this to my account.

my laptop was at home and my little brother got into my notes and saw my account information so it was done without my consent dont act like this is my fault sir

Unfortunately, you are responsible for the security of your account login info, and leaving it around for others to easily find is negligence and you'll be held accountable for what happens when people use it.

Player Support *sometimes* may give you one pass for allowing your login info to be stolen so easily, but it's not guaranteed that they'll reverse this. Simply submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and make your case, and see what they decide.

In the meantime, if you haven't already I suggest changing your passwords that were compromised, and not leaving them vulnerable again.

Actually it might matter; If the story he told us is true, he was 'hacked' by his brother. Not all hacking is software hacking after all. However it isn't my (or your) job to determine if he is speaking the truth or not. That is a job for Riot people and OP has been guided to Riot support already so we can let the case to rest. 

I just wanted to remind people, that software hacking isn't the only way to 'hack' to gain unauthorized access to program/location/information and that is why I replied to this 11 hours old comment. I hope I am not too much of a necromancer for these boards. ;) 

When looking at this from perspective of Riot Games, I find this ban very unlikely to be undone; if they undo this ban, they open up a way for pretty much every ban to get undone. I cannot see them doing that.
Odd that your brother was playing a lot of the same champions you were last season. Also, I'm forced to call bullshit on you going to college, judging by your grammar.
